tasks.label: Control Run JSON + table API wired

tasks.label: Core Business Brain API + UI helper
tasks.notes: /api/aiwealth/core-business-v1 and /api/aiwealth/core-business-v1.js wired to menu 12.

tasks.label: Daily control-run script & validation wiring
tasks.notes: Shell scripts exist under /opt/founderconsole/scripts; integration into holiday-aware scheduler pending.

tasks.label: IST-correct run_date and timestamps everywhere
tasks.notes: Date/time bug identified; needs final validation that all reports and schedulers use IST consistently.

tasks.label: Simulation = production-equivalent logic (minus cash)
tasks.notes: Control run must behave like full production including broker wiring, limits and approvals; umbrella task.

tasks.label: Universe loader for all NSE EQ symbols (2194+)
tasks.notes: Initial universe & metrics present; needs cross-check vs NSE list and hooks for MF/F&O later.

tasks.label: Creamy layer selection & ranking logic
tasks.notes: Currently selects 200; need beyond-benchmark filters, buckets and richer explainability.

tasks.label: Universe & dictionary tables wired
tasks.notes: Data & Universe router and main overview table wired; more tables and filters pending.

tasks.label: Per-table views with SAP-style filters/sort/layout
tasks.notes: Universe tables need column filters, sorting and layout presets like SAP ALV grid.

tasks.label: Historical price / backtest data wiring
tasks.notes: Stable loaders for multi-year OHLCV used by simulation, backtests and self-learning engine.

tasks.label: All ZIPs & images normalized under bucket engine
tasks.notes: Relocate old ZIPs, normalize folder names and keep Supercoder + AI Wealth artefacts consistent.

tasks.label: Supercoder watcher + timers stable for AI Wealth
tasks.notes: ZIP watcher/services run reliably, no permission issues, unit tests green for AI Wealth pipeline.

tasks.label: Observability for AI Wealth (Loki/Prom/Grafana)
tasks.notes: Fresh logs focused on current runs; dashboards for control run, failures and performance.

tasks.label: Creamy-layer approvals dashboard working end-to-end
tasks.notes: Table shows generated signals with filters/sort; actions still SIM-only and not hitting brokers.

tasks.label: Manual approval first, then auto-approve toggle
tasks.notes: Guardian logic to respect profile, risk bucket and limits; auto mode only after stable manual period.

tasks.label: Weekday control-run scheduler (24×5, pre-open)
tasks.notes: Scheduler triggers control run before market open with configurable time window.

tasks.label: Indian holiday-aware scheduler (NSE/BSE calendar)
tasks.notes: Skips weekends and official market holidays; keeps logs and next-run preview tile.

tasks.label: Zerodha token + session stable for SIM control run
tasks.notes: auto_token_refresher.py works; .env wiring correct; safe retry logic without manual babysitting.

tasks.label: Broker abstraction layer ready for other brokers
tasks.notes: Common OMS adapter ready so Samco/GlobalCapital/others can plug in after Zerodha path is stable.

tasks.label: Max loss / per-trade / exposure limits enforced
tasks.notes: Limits exist in settings; enforcement across generation, approvals and execution still to be wired.

tasks.label: Bucket engine (Conservative/Balanced/Aggressive/Ultra)
tasks.notes: Central engine computes and explains bucket per trade and per portfolio with AI reasons.

tasks.label: Email + WhatsApp alerts for approvals & errors
tasks.notes: Parallel notifications via email + WhatsApp for daily reports, failures, and approval queues.

tasks.label: Razorpay-linked licensing for AI Wealth SIM
tasks.notes: Licences validated via Razorpay success; Founder can see counts, revenue and enable/disable access.

tasks.label: Dry-run #1 – Signals only (no broker calls)
tasks.notes: Validate signals, risk, buckets and dashboards without reaching broker endpoints.

tasks.label: Dry-run #2 – Full path via SIM broker
tasks.notes: Repeat P&L path with simulated orders; ensure audit trail and reconciliation are correct.

tasks.label: Release readiness checklist completed
tasks.notes: All critical items signed off (infra, data, risk, approvals, broker, monitoring).

tasks.label: Deploy build via Supercoder ZIP (frozen v1)
tasks.notes: Frozen v1 ZIP tagged and deployed via watcher; rollback ZIP available.

tasks.label: Blue/Green style traffic flip for AI Wealth endpoints
tasks.notes: Ability to route traffic between old and new versions with quick rollback.

tasks.label: Founder handover & Green/Yellow/Red tiles wired
tasks.notes: FounderConsole shows clear status tiles so you can approve or hold go-live.

tasks.label: SEBI-style disclaimer, logs & audit views
tasks.notes: Legal text, risk warnings and audit log views exposed for review and export.

tasks.label: Technical go-live date locked & communicated
tasks.notes: All services (AI Wealth, FounderConsole, Supercoder) stable for control run on agreed technical date.

tasks.label: Stabilisation window (smoke + sanity passes)
tasks.notes: Dedicated 1–2 week window where smoke tests, sanity checks and bugfixes are prioritised.

tasks.label: Business go-live date & approvals
tasks.notes: Formal approval from Founder after readiness dashboard is GREEN and control run is stable.
